thread.title: Sinéad O’Connor Apologizes for Saying Arsenio Hall Gave Prince Drugs | Pitchfork
thread.title_full: Sinéad O’Connor Apologizes for Saying Arsenio Hall Gave Prince Drugs | Pitchfork

title: Sinéad O’Connor Apologizes for Saying Arsenio Hall Gave Prince Drugs | Pitchfork
text:
Sinéad O’Connor Apologizes for Saying Arsenio Hall Gave Prince Drugs Hall will reportedly drop his $5 million defamation lawsuit against O’Connor Photos by David Corio/Redferns, Frederick M. Brown/Getty Images 
Sinéad O’Connor has apologized to Arsenio Hall after publicly accusing him of supplying drugs to Prince “over the decades.” Hall filed a $5 million defamation suit against O’Connor for her comments. “I apologize for my Facebook posts about Arsenio to the extent that anyone thought I was accusing him of acting as Prince's drug dealer and supplying him with illegal hard drugs, or insinuating that Arsenio had something to do with Prince's death,” she told TMZ . “I sincerely apologize because those statements would be false, and I retract them unequivocally.” Hall’s representatives have reportedly said that the TV host will file to dismiss the lawsuit. 
After Hall initially filed the lawsuit, O’Connor replied , “I'm more amused than I've ever dreamed a person could be and look forward very much to how hilarious it will be watching him trying to prove me wrong.” She added: “He can suck my dick.” All of her original Facebook posts have since been removed.
